emissions.closest_match_explanation: Matched '250 g fresh pasta' to 'pasta, raw' as it is the least processed form of pasta available in the database.
Matched '1 onion' to 'onion, raw' as it is the most basic and least processed form of onion available.
Matched '1 bunch of green asparagus' to 'asparagus, green, raw' as it is the least processed form of asparagus available.
Matched '1 squash' to 'squash, raw' as it is the least processed form of squash available.
Matched '2 dl cream' to 'cream, whipping, 38 % fat' as it is a common form of cream and represents a specific processing level.
Matched '1 dl water' to 'water, tap, drinking, average values' as it is the most common and least processed form of water available.
Matched '6 tbsp grated parmesan' to 'cheese, hard, parmesan, 32 % fidm.' as it is the most relevant option for grated parmesan cheese.
Matched '1 handful of mozzarella' to 'cheese, semihard, mozzarella, 30 % fidm.' as it is the most relevant option for mozzarella cheese.
